name: knockoff
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a cheaper copy of an expensive and popular product: She bought a knockoff of a designer suit.
Add to word list
Add to word list
a cheap and sometimes illegal copy of a popular, more expensive product: a knockoff of sth Would you buy a knockoff of an expensive dress? See also
knock off sth knockoff adjective [ only before noun ]
The company is known for its inexpensive knockoff designer goods.
